title: Nuclei and alpha particle electrostatic force

content.prompt: Each of the following nuclei has been stripped of all electrons and placed the same distance from an alpha particle. Which nucleus exerts the strongest electrostatic force on the alpha particle?

choices.label: 6 12 C MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3969@

7 12 N MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3975@

8 16 O MathType@MTEF@5@5@@397B@

8 19 O MathType@MTEF@5@5@@397E@

9 17 F MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3974@

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
